dimensions.label: Team Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage team projects?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and make all decisions without consulting others.
Your FarTwin will involve everyone in the decision-making process, seeking input from team members.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and use logical reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on creative, out-of-the-box thinking to solve problems.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving money and avoiding unnecessary expenses.
Your FarTwin will spend freely, splurging on luxury items and experiences to bring joy to others.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will absorb knowledge through reading and studying, focusing on facts and data.
Your FarTwin will learn best by doing, experimenting with new ideas and taking risks to gain experience.

dimensions.label: Communication Channels
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to stay connected with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize face-to-face interactions, preferring in-person conversations over digital communication.
Your FarTwin will prefer to communicate through digital channels, such as email or text messages, for convenience and efficiency.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach competition?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively pursue victories, pushing themselves and others to win at all costs.
Your FarTwin will work collaboratively with others to achieve shared goals, prioritizing teamwork over individual success.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on local problems and concerns, prioritizing the needs of their community over global issues.
Your FarTwin will take a holistic approach, considering the impact of actions on a global scale and seeking to make a positive difference worldwide.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize planning and organization, using schedules and to-do lists to stay on track.
Your FarTwin will be flexible and spontaneous, making time for unexpected opportunities and adventures.
